comprehensive_overview: EDTA (Enhanced De Novo Transcriptome Assembler) is a software tool designed for transcriptome assembly from RNA-Seq data. It aims to accurately reconstruct full-length transcripts and improve gene annotation.
core_features:
1. De novo transcriptome assembly from RNA-Seq data
2. Reconstruction of full-length transcripts
3. Improvement of gene annotation
4. Identification of alternatively spliced isoforms
5. Estimation of expression levels
